whoWeAre.title: Who We Are
whoWeAre.subtitle: Your One-Stop App for Home & Property Repairs, Maintenance, and Professional Services
whoWeAre.description: WorkTok revolutionizes home and professional service bookings, offering a streamlined solution to connect you with top-rated local providers through two user-friendly apps. Supported by excellent customer service, WorkTok ensures a seamless experience, removing the hassle from finding reliable services.
whoWeAre.additionalText: Join WorkTok for stress-free access to all your service needs with just a tap, and enjoy high-quality, quick solutions while supporting local talent in Iraq. Welcome to effortless living with WorkTok, where convenience and quality meet.

howItWorks.title: Your Innovative Platform That Connects You With Skilled Professionals In Your Area
howItWorks.subtitle: WorkTalk is the comprehensive solution to find the best experts for your Iraqi home needs

customer.title: How does the customer application work?
customer.description: This application is intended for people who need a service. They log in and write down the problems or service they need. If the requested service matches the service provided by a nearby service provider, the provider is notified.

provider.title: How does the expert (craftsman) application work?
provider.description: This program is intended for people or companies wishing to provide services. They register, choose their location, and list the services they offer. They also give a little description about themselves and upload photos of their work. This helps customers understand what they do and the quality of their work.

mission.title: Top Home Services and Repairs Platform In Iraq
mission.subtitle: We ultimately aim to simplify your life by providing exceptional services, giving you the opportunity to receive multiple quotes to compare, read reviews, and contact professionals directly, thereby making the process of hiring service providers transparent, efficient, and seamless.

sections.title: Mission
sections.subtitle: Redefine Home & Professional Services
sections.content: Our mission is to redefine the home & property services, repairs, and maintenance industry in Iraq by providing unparalleled convenience, reliability, and trust. We strive to enhance the lives of our customers by offering top-quality services and creating a positive impact on the local economy through job creation and empowerment.

sections.title: Vision
sections.subtitle: Setting the Industry Standard for Excellence
sections.content: Our vision is to become an incomparable platform for all home repairs & professional services in Iraq, setting the industry standard for excellence, innovation, and customer satisfaction. We aim to build long-lasting relationships with our customers and service providers, fostering a trusted community that thrives on quality, efficiency, and mutual success.

sections.title: Message
sections.subtitle: Life Becomes Easier.
sections.content: Life Becomes Easier. That's our promise to you. We're dedicated to simplifying life for Iraqis, whether to get jobs done perfectly or to find jobs.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about our platform

questions.question: How do I find service providers in my area?
questions.answer: Simply enter your location and the type of service you need in our search bar. Our platform will show you verified providers near you with ratings and reviews.

questions.question: Are all service providers verified?
questions.answer: Yes, all service providers go through a verification process including background checks, license verification, and quality assessments before joining our platform.

questions.question: How do I pay for services?
questions.answer: You can pay through our secure platform using credit cards, debit cards, or cash on delivery. All payments are processed securely through our system.

questions.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the service?
questions.answer: We have a customer satisfaction guarantee. If you're not happy with the service, contact our support team within 24 hours and we'll work to resolve the issue.

questions.question: How do I become a service provider?
questions.answer: Download our provider app, complete the registration process, submit required documents for verification, and once approved, you can start accepting bookings.

questions.question: What areas do you cover in Iraq?
questions.answer: We currently operate in major Iraqi cities including Baghdad, Basra, Erbil, Mosul, and Najaf, with plans to expand to more cities soon.

questions.question: How do I cancel or reschedule a booking?
questions.answer: You can cancel or reschedule bookings through the app up to 2 hours before the scheduled time. Some providers may have different cancellation policies.

questions.question: Is there a minimum service charge?
questions.answer: Service charges vary by provider and service type. Each provider sets their own rates, which are displayed upfront before you book.

questions.question: How do I contact customer support?
questions.answer: You can reach our customer support through the app's help section, email us at support@worktok.org, or call our helpline at (+964) 7856075950.

questions.question: Do you offer emergency services?
questions.answer: Yes, we have emergency service providers available 24/7 for urgent repairs like plumbing leaks, electrical issues, and lock-outs.

inquiry.title: Have a Question?
inquiry.subtitle: Get in touch with us for any inquiries or support

aboutUs.title: About WorkTok
aboutUs.subTitle: Connecting Iraq's finest service professionals with customers who need quality work done right

ourStory.title: Our Story
items: Founded in 2020, WorkTok emerged from a simple observation: Iraq needed a reliable way to connect skilled professionals with customers seeking quality services.
What started as a small team's vision has grown into Iraq's most trusted service marketplace, serving thousands of customers and supporting hundreds of local professionals.
Today, we're proud to be part of Iraq's digital transformation, creating opportunities and building trust in every interaction.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.subTitle: Your privacy and data security are our top priorities. Learn how we protect and handle your information.

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Your Privacy
commitment.description_1: At WorkTok, we understand that your personal information is valuable and deserves protection. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, share, and protect your information when you use our platform to connect with service providers across Iraq.
commitment.description_2: By using our services, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy. We are committed to transparency and will notify you of any significant changes to our privacy practices.

questions.title: Questions About Your Privacy?
questions.subTitle: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or how we handle your data, please don't hesitate to contact us.

legalCompliance.title: Legal Compliance
legalCompliance.description: This privacy policy complies with applicable Iraqi data protection laws and international best practices. WorkTok is committed to protecting your privacy rights and maintaining the highest standards of data security.

polices.title: Information We Collect
content: Personal information you provide when registering (name, email, phone number)
Professional information for service providers (qualifications, experience, certifications)
Transaction and payment information for completed services
Usage data and analytics to improve our platform
Device information and IP addresses for security purposes

polices.title: How We Use Your Information
content: To connect customers with qualified service providers
To process payments and maintain transaction records
To verify service provider credentials and maintain quality standards
To provide customer support and resolve disputes
To send important updates about our services and policies
To improve our platform through analytics and user feedback

polices.title: Information Sharing
content: We share contact information between customers and service providers for completed bookings
We may share aggregated, non-personal data for business analytics
We comply with legal requests from authorized government agencies
We work with trusted payment processors to handle transactions securely
We never sell your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes

polices.title: Data Security
content: All data is encrypted in transit and at rest using industry-standard protocols
Payment information is processed through PCI-compliant payment processors
Access to personal data is restricted to authorized personnel only
Regular security audits and monitoring to detect potential threats
Secure data centers with physical and digital access controls

polices.title: Your Rights
content: Access and review your personal information at any time
Request corrections to inaccurate or incomplete data
Delete your account and associated data (subject to legal requirements)
Opt out of non-essential communications and marketing
Request a copy of your data in a portable format
File complaints with relevant data protection authorities

polices.title: Data Retention
content: Account information is retained while your account is active
Transaction records are kept for 7 years for legal and accounting purposes
Support communications are retained for 2 years
Analytics data is anonymized and may be retained indefinitely
Deleted accounts are permanently removed within 30 days of deletion request
